DESCRIPTION: Noble Phantasm cards require at least #b100% NP Gauge to be obtained.
Noble Phantasm cards are #yRetain and #yExhaust. Noble Phantasm Cards do not join the deck.
When you would be killed, consume one times of #yUses to survive and restore HP equal to the #yStacks value.
At the start of turn, lose HP equal to the number of Evil Curse.
At the end of your turn, double your #yVigor. Whenever you play a Attack card, return #yVigor.
Gain #b1 Strength during duration. When you would next die, heal HP instead and deal #yDouble #yDamage next turn.
At the start of turn, you and all enemies gain #yBlock equal to its stack count.
Reduce the next time damage taken. At the end of each turn, reduce #b1.
Gain a effect for every #b100% NP. Up to gain #b5 effects at once.
Prevent you would be attacked.
Prevent you would lose HP.
Prevent you would lose HP. When you Prevent, heal #b5 #yHP.
At the start of your turn, remove all Block to ALL enemies.
Your next #yKur #yKigal #yIrkalla gain additional buffs: gain #b3 #yStrength and #yArtifact.
NP Damage adds additional damage to Noble Phantasm attacks.
You cannot play for cooldown turns.
Choose: heal #b30 HP or gain #b100% NP if you use #b1 #yCommand #ySpell.
Whenever you deal #yCritical damage if you have Heroic King, gain #b1 Heroic King. Deal damage again for each Heroic King.
NP Gauge gained from playing cards or taking damage is increased by #b100%.
When you have at least #b10 Crit Stars, non-#yNoble Phantasm attack cards deal #b100% more damage and consume #b10 Crit Stars when played.
Further increases #yCritical Hit damage.
Remove all #yBlock, #yPlated #yArmor, #yMetallicize and #yIntangible from the enemy and deal that times +1 damage.
Gain #b3 #yThorns, #b4 #yPlated #yArmor, #b4 #yRegen, [E] and draw #b1 addition card each turn, #b1 #yIntangible and #b2 #yArtifact.
Remove all #yBlock, #yPlated #yArmor, #yMetallicize and #yIntangible from the enemy.
Has a chance to be #yStunned for 1 turn.
Inflicts Stun on enemies who are not already stunned.
This turn, deal #y50% extra damage to enemies afflicted with Terror.
This turn, deal #y100% extra damage to enemies afflicted with Terror.
At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock.
At the start of its turn, lose HP equal to the number of Combust.
Increases damage taken by #b25% for each stack.
At the start of turn, lose HP equal to the number of Evil Curse.
Cannot play cards. At the start of your turn, lose 1 stack of Eternal Sleep. When all stacks are lost, die.
At the end of your turn, gain #yNP equal to the number of stacks.
Cannot act. At the end of its turn, lose 1 stack of Stunned.
Temporary HP that exists only during battle (not subject to maximum HP limits). Can be lost as HP.

DESCRIPTIONS: Each stack enhances the Noble Phantasm once. All stacks are lost at the end of the turn.
